name: shoppie
explain: The products to be sold must be displayed for online shops. From the user's side, you must be able to place an order for products. When you place an order, you must signup and then place the order. I will ask for the contact ph no. As an admin, you can confirm, cancel, and pending orders, add, delete, and update user accounts, and add, delete, and update products as you like.

name: robot friends
explain: Get json data from Robots api and show card design with react. You can search by card name from search.

name: newsletter
explain: From the user side, you must be able to subscribe by email, from the admin side, you must be able to view the emails, collect the mails and store them in the db.

name: to do list
description: Note to do list for each user who did signup
explain: You can save user signup and to do list. Access the mongodb database and mark it for a user. You must log in again and view it whenever you like.

name: oauth signup form
description: Users can signup email or google or github.
explain: The login system must be signup or login with mail or google acc or github acc

name: mysql signup form
description: User Signup Form with mysql data
explain: The login system is made using mysql database.

name: weather
description: The Weather App is real time weather which weather get from Open Weather Api.
explain: The weather app has set a rate limit from the backend. You can request only 10 times. If you exceed it, you have to wait again. Because the route is cached, making requests will be faster.

name: Two Factor Authentication
description: The Login with Two Factor Authentication as like Google Authenticator, Any Authenticator.
explain: I'm going to signup, I have to do Two Factor. You must login again with the Two Factor code. Made more secure.

name: Verify Mail
description: User can login & Signup and then server sended to verify email and confirm with link.
explain: User signup will be done by email and the server will verify the email by verifying the email. If it is correct, the user account will be verified.

name: image uploader
description: Upload image only ( jpeg, png, jpg) , store to mongodb,  can view uploaded image.
explain: The user should be able to upload the image and access it from the given url whenever he likes. The image is stored using the mongodb database

name: qr generator
description: User can generate qr code from any url if user wants
explain: After entering the user, the url will be changed back to the qr code, and the qr code will be returned from the server using the qr code module.

name: currency exchanger
description: Users can change any country currency and compare other currencies.
explain: Get currencies data from Exchange API and show it back.

name: CinemaCraze
description: This Cinema website is  a institute group projects, I create payment section
explain: Online movie booking has been made.

name: pig game
explain: Pig Game is two player each round roll the dice and greater than 100 is the winner who is the first

name: Minesweeper
explain: The Minesweeper gameâ€™s cells have three states: unopened, opened and flagged. An unopened cell is blank and clickable, while an opened cell is exposed. Flagged cells are those marked by the player to indicate a potential mine location

name: Guess Number
explain: guest number game, this game is a guess hiding number between 1 and 20.

name: math quiz
explain: The math quiz game is about choosing the right answer in three cells

explain: The front-end design for the movie page.

name: Dreaming
explain: The front-end design

name: Flex Panel
explain: The Flex panel Design
